title: EPK-mka
description:
A selection of material created by myself including; dodgy old audio experiments, poems & a badly written film idea; which is an absurd tale surrounding dreams and what have been described to me as out of body experiences. A further chapter or 2 will be added to the story at a later date (I've already set it up for a rather ridiculous ending), but the idea itself is laid out completely in the PDF. Bare in mind also, a large chunk of poems featured in this torrent were written when I was quite young, and the others during a volatile relationship. Still, I decided to breathe new life into them by recording them in audio format. Hopefully my work may be of some interest, and while I admit I am not technically great, I at least have the ability to get my ideas and points of view across. Some may like my work, some may loathe my work, either way, art is a subjective bitch. If you are interested I also have a facebook page where I will post future works, and random oddness. Trust me when I say my page isn't all about me, and hey I'm not asking for money;


In closing, I am by no means expecting big things. I just felt a need to share my odd concepts, and experiences through my work.
